Probe Map
The approximately 650 Kb SpectrumGold AURKA (20q13.2) probe encompasses the entire 23 Kb
AURKA gene on chromosome 20 and adjacent regions, extending from a point centromeric of the
AURKA gene to a point telomeric of the AURKA gene.
